member.name: T:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Badge
member.summary: Renders a Bootstrap badge widget.
Builds the inner content of the control.
member.capability-param: Gets or sets the content inside the badge.
member.param: Gets or sets the Bootstrap color of the badge.
Gets or sets the visual style of the badge.
Gets or sets the command that will be triggered when the badge is clicked.
